belongs_to_collection.name: The Dino Shows w/ Gary Owens and Eric Boardman

overview: The mysterious Dr. Lizardi entrusts Gary and Eric with a dinosaur egg.  Now, they must find out everything they can about dinosaurs before the egg hatches.  This quest takes them everywhere from Knott's Berry Farm to a dig site deep in the Canandian Badlands...
title: Son of Dinosaurs
